text: Django is a good Python Framework, as well as CherryPy and Pylons.

Even though is not a CMS, Django could be very useful.
Django and Pylons are the two most popular Python frameworks that will allow you to rapidly build your own CMS and youtube like video hosting site.

Making your own site instead of relying on a CMS is really going to be your best bet because you will have to figure out a lot of other things like how to convert the uploaded video to FLV that won't a part of the core CMS functionality.

There are a lot of other considerations like leveraging a cloud CDN to deliver your video content that just doesn't exist out of the box in any framework that I can think of, even those written in different languages.
